instructions.name: initialize
docs: Initializes the program with admin and sequencer along with lst, stablecoin
and lst_delegation mint address. Also creates marginfi account which will be
responsible for delegating the funds

instructions.name: deposit
docs: Deposits the specified token to marginfi, restakes it and stores the record
in deposit state. If the user has opted for depositing SOL, then the SOL would
be deposited to the lending pool in exchange for LST. That LST goes through
marginfi and then restaking.

instructions.name: withdraw
docs: Users can withdraw their funds from marginfi and restaking. User needs to have
the receipt token which was created during deposit.

instructions.name: bridgeTokens
docs: Bridge tokens once the rollup is opened.
Only for deposits which were done before the bridge was active.

instructions.name: collectYield
docs: Collects the yield from marginfi by withdrawing, taking out the yield and
depositing the rest back to marginfi.
The yield would then be deposited and the restaked tokens would be transferred
to the escrow accounts on solana-ibc instead of bridging. This is done so that
the yield can be used to rebase the tokens on the rollup.

instructions.name: createMarginfiAccount
docs: New marginfi account is created if the existing account has 16 pools.

instructions.name: updateTokenWhitelist
docs: Whitelists more tokens so that they can be deposited. Basic criteria would be that
the token should have a lending pool on marginfi.

instructions.name: changeAdminProposal
docs: Updating admin proposal created by the existing admin. Admin would only be changed
if the new admin accepts it in `accept_admin_change` instruction.

instructions.name: acceptAdminChange
docs: Accepting new admin change signed by the proposed admin. Admin would be changed if the
proposed admin calls the method. Would fail if there is no proposed admin and if the
signer is not the proposed admin.

instructions.name: updateRollupStatus
docs: Updates the rollup status by setting the channel id and can only be performed once. This
operation cannot be reverted.

instructions.name: updateTokenPauseFlag
docs: Updates the pause flag for the token mint enabling or disabling the deposit of the token.

instructions.name: unlockReceipt
docs: Method which withdraws the receipt tokens which are not yet bridged.

instructions.name: updateRestakingTokenPrice
docs: Updates the price of the tokens relative to sol price which are being restaked. Since the
stake is recorded in lamports, the price of the token is required to calculate the value of
token in terms of lamports. The price should be updated atleast once before it gets stale which
is set during the initialization.
This method just does CPI to restaking program since it also calls the solana-ibc program to update
the stake. Since only the current contract is whitelisted to call the update-stake method in solana-ibc,
the call needs to be made through the bridge-contract.

accounts.name: instruction
docs: The Instructions sysvar.
performs the validation so this is safe even if we donâ€™t check the
address.  Nonetheless, the account is checked at each use.

accounts.name: CommonState
docs: Stores the general information about the program set up
during the initialization.

fields.name: whitelistedTokens
docs: Only these tokens are allowed to be deposited. All the
tokens should have a lending pool on marginfi.

fields.name: lstDelegationMint
docs: The token mint of the stake pool to which native SOL
would be deposited to.

fields.name: marginfiGroup
docs: Account which stores the authority of the
marginfi account. Same marginfi group can be
used for multiple accounts.

fields.name: marginfiAccounts
docs: Account which keeps track of all the balances
of the tokens deposited in marginfi

fields.name: newAdminProposal
docs: The pubkey of the new admin is stored until the
new admin accepts the proposal.

fields.name: bump
docs: Storing bump so that we can reuse and save CU to derive it
everytime

fields.name: channelId
docs: Until the rollup is active, the receipt tokens would be stored in
the current contract and would be transferred once the rollup is active.
The value would be none until the rollup is active.

fields.name: insuranceVault
docs: 20% of the yield that is collected will go to the vault. This address is
set during the initialization and cannot be changed.

types.name: MintWithBank
docs: Stores the token mint along with the bank account of marginfi
to which the tokens would be deposited to. Also contains the
marginfi account index.

fields.name: bank
docs: The bank account to which deposits are made on marginfi

fields.name: marginfiAccountIdx
docs: A single Marginfi account can only deposit to only 15
pools. So if there are more, different Marginfi accounts
would need to be created.

fields.name: paused
docs: Flag which prevents the deposit of the token

fields.name: totalDepositAmount
docs: Used to calculate the yield from marginfi

types.name: MintWithBankPayload
docs: Similar to `MintWithBank` but without marginfi account idx

fields.name: bank
docs: The bank account to which deposits are made on marginfi

errors.name: InsufficientAccounts
errors.msg: Fewer Accounts are provided than expected

errors.name: MarginfiAccountNotFound
errors.msg: Create more marginfi accounts to whitelist more tokens

errors.name: NoProposedAdmin

errors.name: RollupNotActive
errors.msg: Withdrawals are enabled only when rollup is active

errors.name: MaximumTokensExceeded
errors.msg: Maximum of only 16 tokens can be whitelisted during initialization

errors.name: TokenAccountOwnerNotSigner
errors.msg: Token account owner is not the signer
